title: All Bands Concert
caption: April 19th
description: The All Bands Concert will be at the Paul Shaghoian Concert Hall on April 19th, from 7:00 - 8:30 PM. If you would like to purchase tickets, please go to the Front Office. All bands will be performing at this concert. If you have any questions, please talk to Dr. Cornelison.

title: Symphony Orchestra Concert
caption: April 24th
description: The Symphony Orchestra Concert will be at the Paul Shaghoian Concert Hall on April 24th, from 7:00 - 8:30 PM. If you would like to purchase tickets, please go to the Front Office. Only the Symphony Orchestra will be performing at this concert, with a program featuring The Planets, by Gustav Holst. If you have any questions, please see  Dr. Cornelison.
